title: N9ne: The Tale of Kevin Clearwater
description: "I know it's wrong to watch her like this, but she's a temptation I can't resist. She's performing for another man, but I feel like it's all for me. Like she's mine."Nine lives.Nine inches.One chance to make her his.Preppy's brother is about to live up to the family legacy in more ways than one.This is the story of Nine, The Tale of Kevin Clearwater.Nine can be read as a complete standalone.
author: T.M. Frazier
